thought: To craft a polished_granite_slab, I need to first craft 4 polished_granite. To craft polished_granite, I need to craft 4 granite. To craft granite, I need to place diorite and quartz in the crafting grid. I will start by moving the diorite from slot 23 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1
